channel.title: Adding pnpc for non-human npcs? [PI]
channel.description: title says it all. The standing, walking, and pretty much everything else doesnt work. I've updated the apperance in Player.java so i really don't know what my problem is.

item.title: Adding pnpc for non-human npcs? [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Skiire Skiire
item.description:
@Skiire wrote:

The reason those don’t work is because human npcs/characters alike all use the same animations. You’ll have to develop a system that can switch animations depending on the npc used. I’m sure npcs in the same group use the same animation (too lazy to check).

Read full topic
